ISSUE.TITLE: docs: podman-kube-play(1): tables are discombobulated
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Totally weird formatting: field names getting moved into the right-hand column, empty rows, missing fields: ```console $ make docs ... $ man docs/build/man/podman-kube-play.1 ... Pod Fields ┌───────────────────────────────────┬───────────────────────────────┐ │Field │ Support │ ├───────────────────────────────────┼───────────────────────────────┤ │containers │ ✅ │ ├───────────────────────────────────┼───────────────────────────────┤ │initContainers │ ✅ │ ├───────────────────────────────────┼───────────────────────────────┤ │imagePullSecrets │ enableServiceLinks │ ├───────────────────────────────────┼───────────────────────────────┤ ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ does not belong here ``` Problem seems to be related to blank values under `Support` (right-hand column), and seems to be a bug in `go-md2man`. Workaround: we need to do something to https://github.com/containers/podman/blob/main/docs/kubernetes_support.md to remove the empty right-hand columns. Maybe add an X? dash? That's not something I can decide.
